DESCRIPTION: Creatures with [dragonmod:ScorchIcon] take damage at the start of their turn and lose #b1 [dragonmod:ScorchIcon] .

#yZealous creatures deal additional damage equal to their [dragonmod:ScorchIcon] and When Dealing damage to creatures with [dragonmod:SanctifyIcon] they lose HP equal to half their [dragonmod:SanctifyIcon] .
Creatures with [dragonmod:SanctifyIcon] take 25% less damage from attacks, Attackers Spend Stigmata to heal. Cure in excess of your Max HP or Stigmata becomes [dragonmod:BlockIcon.] .
Put X random cards from your draw pile into your hand, discard them after you play a card.
Increases damage dealt & Healing from #yCure.
Spend X [#94bdff]Holy[] [#94bdff]Power[] for an effect
Add the following effect to the end of your Hymn with a delay. The current Verse's delay decreases at the start and the first time you take damage each turn.
After you Chant X times, activate the following effect. At the start of each turn, and the first time each turn you take damage, Chant your oldest Verse.
Reduce the delay of a Verse by 1. At the start of each turn, and the first time each turn you take damage, #yChant your oldest Verse.
[theDragonkin:LightIcon] prevents damage and becomes twice as much block next turn.
When you obtain #b5 Sacrifice spend it and gain #b1 [#94bdff]Holy[] [#94bdff]Power[].
Gained whenever you lose HP. Reduced by Half at the end of your turn. Every 5 Stigmata spent by Cure Increases Damage done & Healing recieved by 1.
Spend [dragonmod:StigmataIcon] to heal. Cure in excess of your Max HP or [dragonmod:StigmataIcon] becomes [dragonmod:BlockIcon] .
The number of cards in your hand and #yHymn pile, excluding this one..
This relic only appears for slayers of Draconic Ancestry.
#yField cards attach to the target when played. NL If this field had #ytime #ycounters it detaches when it has none and recovers all time counters.
This #yField loses a Time counter each time it #yTicks.
Trigger an effect if attached to a creature. NL Ticks automatically at the start of your turn.
Take the following resources from your next turn. NL Borrowed resources not accounted for by the end of next turn will be payed for in #yStagger.
#yRewinding a card puts it on the top of your draw pile, and draws you a card next turn.
The next time an enemy breaks your block, retaliate with the following effect.
#yPanicking creatures deal up to #b50% less damage and will additionally hit random a enemy when attacking. NL #yPanic is reduced each turn increased by the number of extra attacks made.
When #yScried, add this to your hand and trigger the following effect.
Has a Bonus effect from being #yScried. NL When #yScried, add this to your hand.
Reveal the top card of your draw pile, if it matches the listed card type draw it and do the following effect otherwise discard it.
This #yField gains a Time counter each time it #yTicks and performs an effect based on the number of Time counters it has, #yDetaching after the last effect is used.
#ySight reveals cards from the top of your deck at all times.
The effect that follows targets the X closest left adjacent cards. wrapping to the right side of the hand as needed.
Sharpen applied to cards increases the damage they deal this combat.
Shine applied to cards increases the Block they apply this combat.
This card starts combat in your #yBag #yof #yTricks.
Add a random #yCantrip from yor #yBag #yof #yTricks to your hand.
#yChilled creatures give #yBlock equal to their chill and lose #b1 chill when they take unblocked attack damage or are damaged by an #yIcicles.
#yOrb : Deals damage to the last enemy you attacked. After being #yEvoked, if your next orb is an #yIcicle #yEvoke it.
#yOrb : Applies [dragonmod:ChillIcon] to random enemies each turn. When #yEvoked applies [dragonmod:ChillIcon] to ALL enemies.
When an Orb is Removed from a crystal orb slot, gain #b1 Temporary Focus and lose that orb slot.
An orb channeled into a Hail orb slot in addition to its other effects deals damage to a random enemy twice. NL when an Orb is Removed from a hail orb slot lose that orb slot.
A Bonus effect if the last card played matches the listed type.
Activate the passive effect of your next orb.
#yFreezing a card causing it to #yRetain until retained or played 3 times.
#yBleeding creature lose HP at the start of your turn and lose all Bleed. NL #yBleeding creatures can't act if their [dragonmod:BleedIcon] will kill them.
#yRimeburst effects activate if a card in your hand has #yIce #yCounters on it.
[dragonmod:SubzeroIcon] is reduced by Half when you channel an icicle, increasing its base damage that much.
